Original meaning 本义: Meaning land reclaimed from a wetlands/river, dike/embankment/man-made island

潏字的基本解释

潏
yù
水涌出：潏潏。潏湟（水疾流）。

潏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jué］
［《廣韻》古穴切，入屑，見。］
［《廣韻》餘律切，入術，以。］
(1)水涌流貌。
(2)水名，也称泬水。源出陕西省终南山，北流经西安市注入渭水。关中八川之一。
[②]［shù］
［《廣韻》食聿切，入術，船。］
指堤堰、鱼梁等水中土石工程。

潏字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潏； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页648第30
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?古穴切，音玦。【說文】涌出也。【木華·海賦】天綱浡潏。　又水中坻也。【爾雅·釋水】水中可居曰洲，人所爲爲潏。　又水名，在京兆。【司馬相如·上林賦】酆鎬潦潏。【註】潏水，出杜陵。　又【廣韻】食聿切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】食律切，?音術。義同。　又【廣韻】餘律切【集韻】允律切【韻會】【正韻】以律切，?音聿。水流貌。【張衡·南都賦】沒滑瀎潏。【註】亦音決。　【集韻】或作泬。

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
bubble
yù
Water gushing out: squeaking.潏huang (water rush).
bubble
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jué］
["Guangyun" ancient acupoint cutting, into the scraps, see. ]
["Guang Yun" Yu Lv cut, into the operation, to. ]
(1) Water flow appearance.
(2) The name of water, also known as 泬shui. It originates from Zhongnan Mountain in Shaanxi Province and flows northward through Xi'an City to inject Weishui water. One of the eight rivers in Guanzhong.
[②]［shù］
["Guangyun" Shiyu cut, enter surgery, boat. ]
Refers to dikes, fish beams and other underwater earth and rock projects.
bubble
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　潏; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 648 to 30
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Ancient acupoint cut, sound Jue. [Said the text] Well out. [Muhua·Haifu] Tian Gangxun.　It's still in the water. 【Erya·Shishui】You can live in Yuezhou in the water, and you can do whatever you want.　Also known as water, in Jingzhao. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Feng Hao scribbled. 【Note】Push water and leave Duling.　[Guangyun] Shi Yuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Shi Luqie, sound technique. The same meaning.　[Guangyun] Yuluqie [Jiyun] Yunluqie [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Cut with the law,? Yinyu. Water flow appearance. [Zhang Heng·Nandu Fu] Not slippery. [Note] Yi Yin Jue.　【Ji Yun】or Zuo 泬.
